nodes.title: use v4 fragment support library to cater for android 5.1
make user wait for service to finish
don't show Send Button on mainnet (instead of crashing when clicked)
Wallet Details on long press in wallet list
check daemon availability & save only on first sync
fix save prefs when starting wallet
Added an application suffix to distinguish between release and debug ver
Remove the gap at the bottom in the wallet fragment.
fix some strings and remove debugging code
Translate strings and privacy policy to Spanish.
store on exit wallet if not synced
Create new wallets in app-private storage
Added okhttp to the license string
Use OkHttp to get exchange rates
zoom into qr code on touch
Don't prevent screenshots in debug mode
tx details consistent with tx list
no more animation because of OOMs
Adjusted visibility of fields and methods.
Adding note about name of backups folder changing.
Bugfix Service restart after OS kill
Added explicit info about keeping mnemonic seed safe
Bugfix: Generate screen is now scrollable
Bugfix: crashing on android 5 & 6 (new wallet, receive, ...)
Bugfixes based on ANR reports from google
Die if getAddress() is not valid
allow back only if not accepting wallet
Add support for USD/EUR on receive
Added more files and directories to gitignore
added hint that amount is in XMR when receiving
request and respond to permissions marshmallow style
Use AsyncTask with 5MB stack in lots of places
add our stagenet server to defaults
show correct amount for pending tx
coinmarketcap for exchange rates instead of kraken
Inform user the progress or result of opening wallet
NFC backup.  can store wallet address, spend key ,view key, seed, block height  in NFC(Authenticated by the NFC default key now)
shorten de label for receive button
First time to learn github for Monero translation of chinese.
added missing string for de translation
Popup notice for new CrAzYpass feature
Translate new Italian strings in strings.xml and help.xml
use CrAzYpass for send verification as well
separate monero/monerujo folder for debug version
Add reference to the Localization Workgroup in the README
change suggested ringsize from 5 to 7 in help.xml
new version id for monero PR#3526
build for x86 & arm in both 32 & 64 bits
Enable Restore with Date instead of Height Only
Background borderless for nicer ripple effect in numpad
save on exit only with connected wallet
Translation of newly added lines to french
Direct Streetmode & credentials for disabling it
fix crash when no ledger connected
Street Mode hides all balances & previous transactions
Update zh-rTW translation for node version warning
deal with illegal values for device type
Remove settings & fix prio to default
deal correctly with escaped strings in qr code
Refresh QR code when notes changed
Avoid firing actions twice on KEYCODE_ENTER
Better offline estimation of restore height
Improve method of enumerating available locales
hamburger on sync only in wallet screen
Wrap change password layout with ScrollView (Fix #346)
Fix "restore from seed" too long on certain devices
Show message for recoverable error encountered during authentication
reduce restore height some more for new wallets
double size of node bookmark icon
Better handling of monero core error messages
deal with not finding any text on clipboard
readme: update contact info of the localization workgroup
use daemon height for new wallets if available
focus on password if no fingerprint
Update Japanese localization, fix English typo
get rid of keystore exception on first call
hide sweep amount in street mode
Allow swipe-to-dismiss transactions in street mode
updated pt-BR translation help and node strings
ES Translation of strings and help v1
don't update on every single block (again)
fix Wallet.isSynchronized() to not query daemon
Make it possible to preserve internal app data on uninstall
Exchange rate was hard to find.
confirm checkboxes for delete confirmation dialogs
reset wallet by deleting wallet cache file
Random fixes incl. startup crash on API21
show total incoming amount for subaddresses
migrate to scoped storage and API 30
show new incoming tx in subaddress details
Tweaking UI & some bugfixing on the way
Fix transactions not updating when switching accounts
catch cases where the qr code produces a null monero address
don't show connection error if we havent tested yet
fix keyboard crash when no view in focus
Catches invalid data that breaks getEncodedQuery
always apply tx_amount from qr code
force agree for fingerprint send in onboarding
Renamed folder to '*-uk' and files to `*-uk`.
update heights & fix date parsing bug
change error message to 16 for payment ids
fix XMR missing in open wallet
use kraken for EURXMR exchange rate
